alert.note: Alert for Custer (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 9:12PM MDT until June 13 at 9:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL CUSTER COUNTY... At 912 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of Buffalo Gap, or 11 miles northeast of Hot Springs, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Buffalo Corrals around 915 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Fairburn. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
